metadata.title: CVE-2024-42273 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:f2fs: assign CURSEG_ALL_DATA_ATGC if blkaddr is validmkdir /mnt/test/compf2fs_io setflags compression /mnt/test/compdd if=/dev/zero of=/mnt/test/comp/testfile bs=16k count=1truncate --size 13 /mnt/test/comp/testfileIn the above scenario, we can get a BUG_ON. kernel BUG at fs/f2fs/segment.c:3589! Call Trace:  do_write_page+0x78/0x390 [f2fs]  f2fs_outplace_write_data+0x62/0xb0 [f2fs]  f2fs_do_write_data_page+0x275/0x740 [f2fs]  f2fs_write_single_data_page+0x1dc/0x8f0 [f2fs]  f2fs_write_multi_pages+0x1e5/0xae0 [f2fs]  f2fs_write_cache_pages+0xab1/0xc60 [f2fs]  f2fs_write_data_pages+0x2d8/0x330 [f2fs]  do_writepages+0xcf/0x270  __writeback_single_inode+0x44/0x350  writeback_sb_inodes+0x242/0x530  __writeback_inodes_wb+0x54/0xf0  wb_writeback+0x192/0x310  wb_workfn+0x30d/0x400The reason is we gave CURSEG_ALL_DATA_ATGC to COMPR_ADDR where thepage was set the gcing flag by set_cluster_dirty().

criterions.comment: linux package in jammy is affected and needs fixing.
linux-hwe-5.19: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'superseded by linux-hwe-6.2').
linux-hwe-6.2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'superseded by linux-hwe-6.5').
